name: AcuteOrEvolvingMI
title: Acute or Evolving MI
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses used to identify patients with an acute or evolving myocardial infarction.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with an acute or evolving myocardial infarction. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the Result attribute.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include codes that describe the disorder ST elevation myocardial infarction with mention of site.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that describe non Q wave myocardial infarction and non ST elevation myocardial infarction.)
